newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nichiei to post interim special loss.
newsitem.headline: Nichiei to post interim special loss.

text.p: Lumber firm Nichiei Co Ltd said on Tuesday it would post a 12.3 billion yen extraordinary loss in its earnings in the six months to September 30, 1996, due to the filing for liquidation by its unit Nichiei Finance Co Ltd.

Nichiei Co said that it would post a parent net loss of 12 billion yen in the six months to September 30, 1996, against an actual interim parent net profit of 215 million yen in the same year-ago period.

It also said that it would post a parent net loss of 10.7 billion yen in the full 1996/97 business year ending March 31, against an actual parent net profit of 201 million yen in the year-ago period. Nichiei Co also does not plan to pay an interim or full-year dividend in 1996/97, the company said.
Nichiei Co said that it expected to post a group net loss of 10.20 billion yen in 1996/97, against an actual net loss of 189 million yen before.
